name: Business-Friends
description:
Business-Friends

How much can you earn thanks to your friends?

Clicker, Pou

Your friends will not work hungry, feed them or they will leave you

Notes

  • Buttons marked "Move" must be dragged when pressed
  • The table at the top shows your largest number of friends. How friendly are you?
